Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 -- 0.6 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText:
Shall the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a six-tenths of one mill (0.6) tax on all the
property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $164,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of maintaining and supporting social services and programs in the Parish, including, but not limited to, the Council on Aging, Quad Area, CASA, Happi Llandiers and other social service operations, as may be determined by the Parish Council on an annual basis, and acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating facilities and equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 -- 1.5 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a one and one-half mills (1.5) tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $410,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of maintaining, operating and/or improving the public hospital in the Parish?

Shall the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a four mills (4) tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $1,093,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of constructing and equipping a fiber optics system in the Parish to provide for cable television services and telecommunications and high speed internet access capability?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW HRC Amendment No. 1 -- Art. III, Secs. A-D, Art. IV, Secs. A, H, Art. VII, Secs. E, F, I - PC
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall the following Sections of the West Feliciana Parish Home Rule Charter be amended as more specifically described in the Summary of Proposed Amendments on file and available for review with the West Feliciana Parish Government and available on-line at www.wfparish.org, being the same amendments set forth in West Feliciana Parish Ordinance 2016 October 10-01, Article III, Section A, Article III, Section B, Article III, Section C, Article III, Section D, Article IV, Section A, Article IV, Section H, Article VII, Section E, Article VII, Section F, and Article VII, Section I, which proposed amendments are hereby incorporated by reference and made a part of this proposition?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW HRC Amendment No. 2 -- Art. III, Sec. C - PC
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall Article III, Section C, Paragraph 5 of the West Feliciana Parish Home Rule Charter be amended to require that all of the appointed members of the West Feliciana Parish Planning Commission reside within the unincorporated area of West Feliciana Parish, to change the number of non-voting members and to provide that the non-voting members are not part of the quorum?
